post.text: Thoughts & prayers with the millions of people in the path of Hurricane Matthew. Look out for neighbors, and listen to your local officials.

comment.author: Dana
comment.text: and what a joke...BIll being the first lady....really people...he should of been impeach and never allowed in the White House again...he gets to lap up all the luxuries while the women he took advantage of, and yes it takes two to tango.. how we the people treat them..hmmm so I guess Hillary will now only have to put bill in the corner with some balloons... SMH TRUMP 2916... Prayers and thoughts to the all being effected by Hurricane Matthew... <3

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: No, she'll put Bill in a room with his women & then call them all liars and etc just like before. LOL

replies.author: Samantha Leigh
replies.text: AT THE SAME TIME HILLARY WANTS TO Run NEGATIVE COMMERCIALS?? On the Weather Channel. Just seen one Hillary's use of people's suffering. Karma TRUMP has my Vote NOW!!!

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: It does take two to do wrong like what Bill did. However no one deserved to be threatened, as his women claimed they were.
